In collaboration with SEPTEMBER. Microfiber towels are the perfect keep in the car, or bike bag, do-everything item. Use to brush off dirt and sweat, dry off after a dip in the river/lake, or to cover up while you change in the parking lot. Towels feature our unique seasonal print that we collaborated with SEPTEMBER to create.

The Moana Bikini Top combines style and function, offering full coverage and a secure fit for all your water adventures. Its pull-over design ensures ease and comfort, while the supportive structure keeps you confident during activities like swimming, surfing, or days spent on the river! Cute and versatile, the Moana Bikini Top is perfect for active days in and out of the water!

We’re re-releasing everyone’s fave graphic on Wild Rye's classic cotton tee to raise money (and hell) for women’s rights. $5 from every shirt sold will be donated to Planned Parenthood. We’ve always shown up for women—and we’re not stopping now. Let’s put our dollars where it matters. The "Ride Fast, Raise Hell" artwork was created in collaboration with artist and pro team rider, KaJay Rooke.

Dress","handle":"parker-action-dress","body_html":"

The Parker Active Dress is built for movement but styled for spontaneity. Lightweight, breathable, and quick-drying, she keeps you cool even when summer starts to feel like an oven. No built-in shorts means she’s easy, breezy (and more versatile)—wear ’er to the beach or on a hike or make it your casual brunch ’fit. She’s the kind of dress that doesn’t ask what’s the plan—she just says “hell yes.”

New to the gang, the Lola Muscle Tank is a play on the Merritt Muscle Tank but with a bit more pizzaz. Featuring a high neck, relaxed arm openings, and a keyhole vent in the back, the Lola can boogie down at a concert just as easily as she can tow you into a jump line.

Enduro trail riding to gravel adventure or backcountry powder mission, the Smith Bobcat sunglasses are for riders and skiers who want the full coverage of the Wildcat with a smaller fit and a lightweight feel. This hybrid design pairs goggle-like coverage with the airflow and easy-wear feel of sunglasses. ChromaPop™ brings out the details on forested trails and in bright alpine bowls. The lens is interchangeable, and a bonus clear lens is included for low-light needs. No-slip fit details keeps them in place through rocky terrain and high-speed descents.

Rye ChromaPop Black"]},{"name":"Size","position":2,"values":["One Size"]}]},{"id":9746059100464,"title":"Smith Network Mips®","handle":"wild-rye-x-smith-network-mips","body_html":"

You've always been drawn to the challenge of a new route, a new trail, the thrill of the unexpected. Designed for whatever you get into on two wheels, the Smith Network is our versatile, shred-ready bike helmet. Safety techs like KOROYD® and Mips® offer protection and enhanced energy absorption should you need it. When the sun is blazing and you're heating up, the ventilation system keeps air flowing and your eyewear fog-free. Later, when the light dips beneath the hills, store your shades in pass-through channels on the front.

Smith X Wild Rye"]},{"name":"Size","position":2,"values":["S","M"]}]},{"id":9746062541104,"title":"Smith Forefront 3 Mips®","handle":"wild-rye-x-smith-forefront-3-mips","body_html":"

From flowy single track to technical descents, the Smith Forefront 3 Mountain Bike Helmet has your back (and front and sides) more than ever thanks to a complete internal injected roll cage, extended back coverage and a Mips® Safety System that's integrated directly into the helmet padding for more comfort. Add venting that increases airflow by 25 percent, a micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System and complete Koroyd® coverage, and you have a helmet that's as comfortable as it is loaded with cutting-edge design and impact protection. And when you start to sweat as you climb or prepare to drop in on a descent, you can count on the 20 vents plus our AirEvac™ ventilation to keep your sunglasses or goggles fog-free. The visor adjusts for easy goggle storage between laps, and you can slide your sunglasses into the shell for secure storage on the front or back.
